author: cmlenz
msg: - the Cactus convention for test classes is TestXXX, not XXXTest
- add tests to ensure that different test case instances and different test methods result in unique IDs
- add the UniqueGenerator test to the test suite

author: cmlenz
msg: - add IP address to the generated ID (doesn't really hurt, and makes IDs unique where multiple client machines are running tests against a single test server)
- as we already included the identity hash of the testcase-instance, we don't need to also include the name of the test case
- add a method that let's us override the time component, for better testability
